description: This warm beef-sausage salad has all the right ingredients for a stress-free midweek dinner: itâ€™s easy to make, filling and full of flavour.
name: Mexican Sausage & Bean Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g can no-added-salt Mexican-style 3 bean mix, drained, rinsed
420g can sweet corn kernels, drained, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add sausages and cook, turning occasionally, for 8 minutes or until cooked and browned. Remove from heat. Cool slightly. Slice.
Place the coleslaw kit in a large bowl. Add beans, corn and sausages. Add dressing from the kit. Toss to combine.
Spoon salad into serving bowls. Top with avocado. Serve sprinkled with spring onion.
